item.description:
The Digital Photo Academy Presents Lensbaby training 9-25-10

What is a a Lensbaby and how does it work? What is selective focus?
How can this make photography more fun? If you would like answers to these questions or even if you know the answers, then here is where you want to be this coming Saturday from 12:00pm to 3:00pm. The Digital Photo Academy, in conjunction with E.P. Levine and Lensbaby is offering a FREE 3-hour, hands-on course in Life with Lensbabies.

Instructor Kathy Tarantola will show you the ropes in our Studio B.

To register, go to: www.digitalphotoacademy.com

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Digital Photo Academy Presents Free Lensbaby training 9-25-10
